methods.applyUpdate:
Apply this update to this SelectAndViewAnalyzer.

:param upstream: (io.deephaven.db.v2.ShiftAwareListener.Update) - the upstream update
:param toClear: (io.deephaven.db.v2.utils.ReadOnlyIndex) - rows that used to exist and no longer exist
:param helper: (io.deephaven.db.v2.select.analyzers.SelectAndViewAnalyzer.UpdateHelper) - convenience class that memoizes reusable calculations for this update
methods.calcEffects:
Our job here is to calculate the effects: a map from incoming column to a list of columns that it effects.
 We do this in two stages. In the first stage we create a map from column to (set of dependent columns).
 In the second stage we reverse that map.

:return: java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String[]>
methods.create:
:param mode: io.deephaven.db.v2.select.analyzers.SelectAndViewAnalyzer.Mode
:param columnSources: java.util.Map<java.lang.String,io.deephaven.db.v2.sources.ColumnSource>
:param index: io.deephaven.db.v2.utils.Index
:param parentMcs: io.deephaven.db.v2.ModifiedColumnSet
:param publishTheseSources: boolean
:param selectColumns: io.deephaven.db.v2.select.SelectColumn...
:return: io.deephaven.db.v2.select.analyzers.SelectAndViewAnalyzer
